resources.string: Also called Chrematophobia. It is the fear of money and capital values. Experts say that this phobia is not something temporary, but persistent (and unjustified) in sufferers. Another related phobia the Aurophobia, which is the fear of gold.

Fear of teenagers. Irrational fear, panic or hysteria, usually through the media, related to anything that has to do with behavior or social emancipation of underage adolescents (based on the belief that such behavior is more appropriate for grown ups).

Fear of long words. This phobia is characterized by aversion or nervousness when the person engages in conversations where long or uncommon words are used. The disorder is caused by fear of mispronouncing the word in question, because this would represent for the phobic the possibility of being exposed to ridicule, of being at a disadvantage, of being considered someone of inferior culture or low intelligence against their peers. Often this is accompanied by social phobia shyness.
Fear to open the eyes. Eyes share some other phobias like Omatofobia (fear of seeing eyes) or Photophobia (fear of light for fear of affecting the view).
It\'s the fear to acquire new knowledge. A sophophobic person would never download this application.
